text: (atani sodarulannaru): "Itadu dongatanam cesina (ascaryam ledu)! Vastavaniki itani sodarudu kuda intaku mundu dongatanam cesadu." Idi vini yusuph (kopanni) tana hrdayanlone dacukunnadu mariyu danini varipai vyakta paracaledu. (Tana manas'sulo) anukunnadu: "Miru cala nicamaina varu mariyu miru palikedi allah ku baga telusu
